about-view-on-github-description: PieMenyuはオープンソースプロジェクトです。開発に手を貸しましょう！
label-search: 検索するには入力してください...
button-link-pie-menu: パイメニューをリンク
snackbar-pie-menu-deleted: パイメニューが削除されました
tooltip-remove-pie-menu: パイメニューを削除するには長押ししてください
pie-menu-name-saved: パイメニュー名が保存されました。
setting-escape-key-description: エスケープキーを押すと開いているパイメニューを強制的に閉じる
tooltip-add-send-key-task: Add Send Key Task - Send key to the active window
tooltip-paste-text-task: Add Paste Text Task - Send text to the foreground window
tooltip-add-mouse-click-task: Add Mouse Click Task - Click mouse at specific position
tooltip-add-run-file-task: Add Run File Task - Run file or application
tooltip-add-open-sub-menu-task: Add Open Sub Menu Task - Open another Pie Menu
tooltip-add-open-folder-task: Add Open Folder Task - Open folder
tooltip-add-open-app-task: Add Open App Task - Open application if not running, otherwise bring it to front
tooltip-add-open-url-task: Add Open URL Task - Open URL in browser
tooltip-add-open-editor-task: Add Open Editor Task - Open PieMenyu editor
tooltip-add-resize-window-task: Add Resize Window Task - Resize active window
tooltip-add-move-window-task: Add Move Window Task - Move active window to certain position
tooltip-always-launch-if-empty-window-ti: Always open a new instance if window title is empty
tooltip-activation-mode-hint:
Release - Pie Item will be activated when the hotkey is released. 
Hover - Pie Item will be activated when the pie item is hovered. 
Click - Pie Item will be activated when the pie item is clicked.
hint-select-mouse-pos: Move mouse to desired position and hit Enter
tooltip-sub-menu-activation-mode-hint:
Click - Sub Menu will be activated when the pie item is clicked. 
Hover - Sub Menu will be activated when the pie item is hovered.
title-add-pie-menu-from-other-profiles: Add pie menu from other profiles
message-pie-item-not-deleted-0: Nah... I won't allow you to delete the last Pie Item.
message-pie-item-not-deleted-1: You know what? Deleting the last Pie Item is like trying to eat the last slice of pizza and not feeling a little bit sad inside.
message-pie-item-not-deleted-2: I'm sorry, Dave. I'm afraid I can't do that. (Who is Dave?)
message-pie-item-not-deleted-3: This is the last piece of Pie Item. You sure you want to delete it? It's non refundable!
message-pie-item-not-deleted-4: No please! Please don't! It's the last Pie Item in this menu. (´ཀ`」∠):
message-hotkey-is-used: Hotkey is used in another pie menu
description-check-ahp: PieMenyu is originated from AutoHotPie, make sure you also check it out on Github!
description-export-data: Export all profiles, pie menus, pie items, and pie item tasks to file.
description-import-data: Import profiles, pie menus, pie items, and pie item tasks from file.
